https://tmrev.io/movie/434370-Araby 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rR06tuy0hGZCOQpZ7cZO3AwHVYr.jpg André, a teenager, lives in an industrial town in Brazil near an old aluminum factory. One day, a factory worker, Cristiano, suffers an accident. Asked to go to Cristiano’s house to pick up clothes and documents, André stumbles on a notebook, and it’s here that Araby begins — or, rather, transforms. As André reads from the journal entries, we are plunged into Cristiano’s life, into stories of his wanderings, adventures, and loves. Araby
